section.name: Release Notes
section.p: This page contains information on the various released packages of the project.

ul.li: Introduces VLCPlayer widget to embed VLC Media Player plugin.
Code refactoring: library split into modules and packages renamed.
FlashMP3Player and FlashVideoPlayer widgets replaced with the new FlashMediaPlayer widget
JSNI implementation of player widgets reworked to reduce memory leaks
MediaStateListeners now notified when media stream buffering starts/stops
Method calls on QuickTimePlayer object now work in Internet Explorer

subsection.name: 13 March 2009 - Version 0.6
subsection.p: This release introduces the following features

ul.li: FlashVideoPlayer for Flash video playback support, other players also support video playback
SWFWidget class to embed generic Flash applications
Media metadata now supported via MediaInfo class
Automatic player plugin selection algorithm refined to support streaming media protocols.
Issue 2 - All constructors now work fine for WinMediaPlayer
Method calls on QuickTimePlayer object does not work in Internet Explorer although embedding QuickTime plugin with the widget works fine

subsection.name: 13 February 2009 - Version 0.5.1
subsection.p: This release fixes various bugs in the JSNI implementation of the player widgets.

ul.li: Method calls on QuickTimePlayer object does not work in Internet Explorer although embedding QuickTime plugin with the widget works fine
